title: Grand Rapids, Michigan
summary: Grand Rapids is a city and county seat of Kent County in the U.S. state of Michigan.[4]  At the 2020 census, the city had a population of 198,917, which ranks it as the second most-populated city in the state after Detroit.  Grand Rapids is the central city of the Grand Rapids metropolitan area, which has a population of 1,087,592 and a combined statistical area population of 1,383,918.[2]
